page.title: 12ACTIVITIES IN STRETTON ON D.
page.content: IN{STRETTON ON DUNSMORE}THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF ACTIVITIES. FOR THE YOUNG ONES THERE IS A{PLAYGROUP,}WHICH IS HELD THREE DAYS A WEEK,{CUBS, {SCOUTS, BROWNIES AND GUIDES}WHICH ARE ALL HELD IN THE VILLAGE HALL. FOR THE OLD PEOPLE THERE ARE LOTS OF THINGS SUCH AS{W.I., WIVES' FELLOWSHIP}AND THE{OVER 60s CLUB.}THERE IS{KARATE {CLUB}WHICH IS HELD FOR ALL AGES. THERE ARE THREE{PUBS}IN STRETTON, THE OAK AND BLACK DOG, THE SHOULDER OF MUTTON AND THE DUN COW. THE OAK AND BLACK DOG IS THE MOST POPULAR ONE, THE SHOULDER OF MUTTON IS A QUIET PUB AND THE DUN COW IS MORE OF A NIGHT CLUB. THERE IS A{SPORTACULAR}HELD IN THE PLAYING FIELDS AT PLOT LANE. THERE IS{BMX. {RACING, 5 A SIDE FOOTBALL, TUG OF WAR AND{THROWING SPONGES AT PEOPLE.
